sqlMap.insert: INSERT T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG(userCode,tagCode,creator,createTime) SELECT #userCode#, #tagCode#, #creator#, getdate() WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG WHERE userCode = #userCode# AND tagCode = #tagCode# )

INSERT T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG(userCode,tagCode,creator,createTime) SELECT #userCode#, '14052001', #creator#, getdate() WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG WHERE userCode = #userCode# AND tagCode = '14052001' )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG WHERE userCode = #userCode# AND tagCode = '14052001'
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.userCode , t.tagCode , p.optionValue AS tagName from dbo.T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG t LEFT JOIN dbo.T_OMS_PARAMETER p ON t.tagCode = p.optionCode WHERE p.typeKey = '140520' AND t.userCode = #userCode#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_OPERATE_HISTORY(userCode, filed, remark, creator, createTime) SELECT #userCode#, #title#, #field# + 'ï¼š' + p.optionValue, #creator#, GETDATE() from dbo.T_OMS_EMPLOYEE_TAG T LEFT JOIN dbo.T_OMS_PARAMETER p WITH(NOLOCK) ON t.tagCode = p.optionCode WHERE userCode = #userCode#
